aspguidp.service.input.validation

Interface ValidationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TemplateValidationService

    public interface ValidationService
    Interface for a validation service.

    A validation service is responsible to determine the validation status of a given user input string.

    Validation service instances are used to validate the data which is inputted by the user into the input components of the application (InputElementController).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ValidationService.ValidationStatus
      Enum which represents a validation status.
